mainBoard.name: Goblin Balloon Brigade
mainBoard.originalText: {R}: Goblin Balloon Brigade gains flying until end of turn.

rulings.text: You can activate the ability repeatedly during a turn. This generally has no additional effect, unless some other effect (like that from Adarkar Windform has caused it to lose flying since the last time the ability resolved.

For flying to work as an evasion ability, an attacking Goblin Balloon Brigade’s ability must be activated before the declare blockers step begins. Once Goblin Balloon Brigade has become blocked, giving it flying won’t change that.

mainBoard.name: Rally the Forces
mainBoard.originalText: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.

rulings.text: Even though Rally the Forces affects only attacking creatures, the bonus will remain for the rest of the turn.
If Rally the Forces is cast before attackers are declared or after combat ends, it won’t do anything.

mainBoard.text: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.
